v0.1.0.description:
### Initial Release - Please Review Setup Guide Before Using

### Victory Condition - Beat Rival in GLC
  - Victory is collected when the Prize Pokemon is revealed after the fight

### Items - 8 Gym Badges and 8 Gym Keys
  - Also includes junk Pokedoll items to fill empty locations

### How you progress - Keys open gyms, badges open the E4 (you need all 8 of the badges)
### Locations - 2 per gym, checked after defeating the Gym Leader

### Things you need
  - Satdium AP World
  - Project 64 Luna, version 3.6.1
    - https://github.com/Luna-Project64/Luna-Project64/releases
  - Pokemon Stadium ROM, US v1.0
    - MD5Hash = "ed1378bc12115f71209a77844965ba50"

Any questions, DM me or @ me in the Archie server on Discord (jciii)
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.2.0.description: Added new settings for randomization. BST, Gym Leader Castle trainers, and Gym Leader Castle rental Pokémon can all be randomized. You'll need to generate your templates again to access the new settings.
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
- Fixed STAB option, had some legacy code in there that didn't guarantee a STAB move. It was only increasing the chance of a STAB move. 
- Made the option descriptions more clear.
- Gyarados is not a bug.
v0.2.1.title: v0.2.1

v0.3.0.description:
### Minigames Added and Rules Bugfix

- Minigames are now locations to check
  - Must be done in free play
  - Ties are fine, you just need to finish in 1st
- Fixed an issue where there were no rules set for the 'Beat Rival' location
  - Doesn't affect gameplay at all, just makes the spoiler log actually helpful
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
- Hopefully fixed the bug that caused the Magikarp's Splash check to get sent out when it shouldn't be
- VOLTORB is spelled correctly now
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.4.0.description:
- Trainersanity option added
  - When enabled, GLC trainers are added as locations to check
- New GLC Box item
  - 6 are shuffled into the pool
  - Each one received adds 20 Pokémon to the GLC rental table
  - You will now start with only 29 Pokémon available to you for the GLC
- Rental Table shuffle option added

New options are on by default. You must regenerate your templates to access the new options.
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
### Bugfixes
- Trainersanity
  - Fixed bug that put all trainer checks in sphere 1
  - Fixed bug that forced this option on regardless of user selection

### Setup notes
- Updated setup notes to provide some first time patching guidance
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.4.2.description:
- GLC Registration table now properly accounts for received GLC box upgrades
- Fixed bug that caused Clefairy Says check to go out when Rival is defeated
v0.4.2.title: v0.4.2
